data.name: Chromahertz
data.detailed_description:
Chromahertz is a boss rush bullet hell game about drawing with your body. Lead yourself around through hazards and enemies leaving rainbows of destruction in your wake. Be careful where you stop!

Follow the hero Officer W on his quest to purge the Horrors infecting the world and help him rescue his family, the Hermits. And be on the look out for Stranger X who is always one step ahead... Catch him if you can!

Features

  • 37 Boss battles
  • Extra boss phases for skilled players
  • Unlockable content
  • Lead the player around to do damage
  • Slow time to see hazards and set up attacks
  • Ranks and Leaderboards

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor: AMd Ryzen 5 5600X
